00038 /// writes data samples from a single rectangular region 
00039 class PWIZ_API_DECL RegionSIC : public MSDataAnalyzer
00040 {
00041     public:
00042

00044     {
00045         double mzCenter;

00049 
00050         Config(const std::string& args); 
00051     };
00052 
00053     RegionSIC(const MSDataCache& cache, const Config& config);
00054 
00055     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00056     //@{

00058

00060                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;

00063                         const Spectrum& spectrum);

00065     virtual void close(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00066     //@}
